meanings.definition: Relating to or situated on the banks of a river.
meanings.sent1: The riparian trees along the river provided shade and shelter for the animals.
meanings.sent2: The house had a beautiful view of the riparian landscape by the river.
meanings.sent3: The riparian picnic spot was so popular that even the ducks wanted to join in.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork captured the riparian beauty of the riverbank in vivid colors.
meanings.sent5: The riparian setting was so peaceful, it felt like a dream by the water.

meanings.definition: A plant or animal that lives or grows on the banks of a river.
meanings.sent1: The beavers were busy building their dam near the riparian area.
meanings.sent2: Birdwatchers often spot interesting riparian species along the river.
meanings.sent3: The riparian plants seemed to gossip about the latest river news.
meanings.sent4: The riparian creatures danced along the riverbank in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The riparian wildlife added a touch of magic to the river's edge.
